QuestData.Title: WANTED: James Clark
QuestData.Description: By decree of the Stormwind Army, a bounty has been placed on the head of James Clark.$B$BClark is wanted for robbery, burglary, arson, and murder. He is also a suspect in the kidnapping and disappearance of the Brackwell's prized pig, Princess.$B$BJames Clark was last seen heading towards Eastvale Logging Camp.$B$BBring James Clark to justice and report to Marshal Patterson at Eastvale Logging Camp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill James Clark and take James Clark's Head.
